Class WebhookProcesser

java.lang.Object
WebhookProcesser
public class WebhookProcesser
extends java.lang.Object
This class processes a webhook request sent after a commit to the GitHub repository. Contains methods used to download builds, extract files, run tests and set commit status.
Since:
1.0

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void downloadRevision​(java.lang.String commitSHA)
    Downloads a revision in a single zip file.
    static void extractZip()
    Extracts the zip produced by downloadRevision(String commitSHA).
    static void handleWebhookEvent​(org.json.JSONObject json)
    Handles a webhook request and runs maven tests and build the project depending on the content in the request.
    static boolean isBuildSuccess​(javax.json.JsonObject buildResult)
    Takes a JSON object and fetches the result of the build.
    static org.json.JSONObject payloadToJSON​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
    Will extract and convert the payload to a json file.
    static javax.json.JsonObject runBuild​(java.lang.String commitSHA)
    Builds and runs the tests and saves the results in JSON format.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • handleWebhookEvent

      public static void handleWebhookEvent​(org.json.JSONObject json) throws java.io.IOException
      Handles a webhook request and runs maven tests and build the project depending on the content in the request.
      Parameters:
      json - JSON object containing push data.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • payloadToJSON

      public static org.json.JSONObject payloadToJSON​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request) throws java.io.IOException
      Will extract and convert the payload to a json file.
      Parameters:
      request - the request that contains the payload.
      Returns:
      a JSON object representing the payload.
      Throws:
      java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
      java.io.IOException

    • downloadRevision

      public static void downloadRevision​(java.lang.String commitSHA)
      Downloads a revision in a single zip file.
      Parameters:
      commitSHA - the SHA-code of the revision.

    • extractZip

      public static void extractZip()
      Extracts the zip produced by downloadRevision(String commitSHA).

    • runBuild

      public static javax.json.JsonObject runBuild​(java.lang.String commitSHA) throws java.io.IOException
      Builds and runs the tests and saves the results in JSON format. Used after the contents of the zip has been extracted.
      Parameters:
      commitSHA - String containing the hash of the particular commit to run.
      Returns:
      JSON object containing the test results of the build.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • isBuildSuccess

      public static boolean isBuildSuccess​(javax.json.JsonObject buildResult)
      Takes a JSON object and fetches the result of the build.
      Parameters:
      buildResult - a JSON object that contains the results of the build.
      Returns:
      true if commit build managed to build without failures or errors, otherwise returns false.
